title: Demo Capsule Feature Set
description: Implement input validation for the Contact type. ValidateEmail and ValidatePhone functions should enforce format constraints and return descriptive errors.
acceptance_criteria: All Contact fields have validation functions; invalid input returns descriptive errors

title: Add input validation
description: As a developer, I want Contact fields validated on input so that malformed data is rejected before use.
acceptance_criteria: ValidateEmail and ValidatePhone exist, tested, and called from main

title: Validate email format
description:
Implement ValidateEmail(email string) error that checks for presence of @ and a domain with at least one dot.

Acceptance criteria:
- Returns nil for valid emails (user@example.com)
- Returns error for missing @ (userexample.com)
- Returns error for missing domain (user@)
- Returns error for empty string
- Error messages are descriptive
acceptance_criteria: ValidateEmail returns nil for valid emails and descriptive errors for invalid ones

title: Validate phone format
description:
Implement ValidatePhone(phone string) error that checks for a valid US phone pattern (digits, optional dashes/spaces).

Acceptance criteria:
- Returns nil for valid phones (555-0100, 5550100, 555 0100)
- Returns error for too few digits
- Returns error for letters in input
- Returns error for empty string
- Error messages are descriptive
acceptance_criteria: ValidatePhone returns nil for valid phones and descriptive errors for invalid ones
